DiscrepancyNoteAction.Message: Date of Resolution should not occur prior to the Date of Onset. Please verify your response.
'Other' should only be completed if 'Other' was selected for Outcome. Please verify your response.
'Other' was selected for Outcome. Please specify in the field provided.
'Ongoing' was selected for Outcome but a Date of Resolution was entered. Please verify your response.
If not 'Ongoing', please provide the Date of Resolution.

RuleDef.Name: AE Log: Verify Date Onset vs Date Resolution
RuleDef.Description: Date of Resolution should not occur prior to the Date of Onset.

RuleDef.Name: AE Log: Other should be blank
RuleDef.Description: Other should be blank unless selected for Outcome.
RuleDef.Expression: I_ADVER_AE_OTOUT ne "" and (I_ADVER_AE_OUT eq 1 or I_ADVER_AE_OUT eq 2 or I_ADVER_AE_OUT eq 3 or I_ADVER_AE_OUT eq 4)

RuleDef.Name: AE Log: Other should be completed
RuleDef.Description: If Other is selected for Outcome, the 'If Other, specify' field should be completed.

RuleDef.Name: AE Log: Date Resolution not Ongoing
RuleDef.Description: If Date of Resolution is provided, 'Ongoing' should not be selected for Outcome.

RuleDef.Name: AE Log: Date Resolution Required
RuleDef.Description: Date of Resolution should be provided if any option except 'Ongoing' was selected for Outcome.
RuleDef.Expression: (I_ADVER_AE_OUT eq 1 or I_ADVER_AE_OUT eq 2 or I_ADVER_AE_OUT eq 4 or I_ADVER_AE_OUT eq 5) and I_ADVER_AE_DTRE eq ""
